text: Usaile dharti phaila'era ochya'i di'eko cha, ra tyasama pahara ra kholaharu nirmana garidi'eko cha, ra tyasama kisima kisimaka phala–phulaharuka joda–joda dohoro–dohoro utpanna garidi'eko cha. Usaile ratala'i dinabata chipa'idincha, nihsanndeha socne, bujhneharuka lagi yasama dherai (pratika) cinhaharu chan
